      • createBufferedImage

        BufferedImage createBufferedImage(int w,
                                  int h,
                                  int type)
        Create a buffered Image of the given size and type. In this context, buffered image means editable image (admits setRGB etc) If the size is bigger of max physical size of buffered image, creates a file mapped buffered Image.
        Parameters:
        w - width in pixels of the requested image
        h - height in pixels of the requested image
        type - image type (refers to bands, etc. see Image
        Returns:
        a buffered (editable) image of the desired size and type
        See Also:
        setMaxPhysicalSizeOfBufferedImage, getMaxPhysicalSizeOfBufferedImage

      • createVirtualBufferedImage

        BufferedImage createVirtualBufferedImage(int w,
                                         int h,
                                         int type)
        Create a file mapped buffered Image of the given size and type. In this context, buffered image means editable image (admits setRGB etc)
        Parameters:
        w - width in pixels of the requested image
        h - height in pixels of the requested image
        type - image type (refers to bands, etc. see Image
        Returns:
        a buffered (editable) image of the desired size and type
        Throws:
        IOException
